answerText: Völund (accept Wayland)[10] Another hero of the Poetic Edda is Helgi Hundingsbane, who is sometimes considered the son of this figure. This figure's sister once smeared honey on his face, allowing him to kill a wolf by biting off its tongue.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Editors 2 | 5 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] This blacksmith married the Valkyrie Hervor and was imprisoned by the king Nidud. As revenge, he killed the king's sons, making goblets from their skulls and jewelry from their eyes and teeth.
